examples.example: 我在门口满心欢喜地迎接朋友的到来。

translate.english: I happily welcome the arrival of friends at the door.

examples.example: 我站在门口微笑着和邻居打招呼。

translate.english: I stood at the door, smiling and greeting the neighbor.

examples.example: 我每天都会在门口摆放一束鲜花，让路过的人也能感受到生活的美好。

translate.english: I will put a bunch of fresh flowers at the door every day to let the people passing by also feel the beauty of life.
